links: T. D. Noe, Rows n = 0..100 of triangle, flattened
formula: a(n) = 5^(n-trinv(n))+5^trinv(n), where trinv(n) = floor((1+sqrt(1+8*n))/2) = A002262(n) and n-trinv(n) = A003056(n).Regarded as a triangle T(n, k) = 5^n + 5^k, so as a sequence a(n) = 5^A002262(n) + 5^A003056(n).
mathematica: t = 5^Range[0, 9]; Select[Union[Flatten[Table[i + j, {i, t}, {j, t}]]], # <= t[[-1]] + 1 &] (* _T. D. Noe_, Oct 09 2011 *)
author: _Henry Bottomley_, Jun 22 2000
